article_refs.quote: ... administrative fines of up to EUR 35 000 000 or, if the offender is an undertaking, up to 7 % of its total worldwide annual turnover for the preceding financial year, whichever is higher ...

content.text: Violations of Article 5 prohibited AI practices are subject to fines up to EUR 35,000,000 or 7% of total worldwide annual turnover (whichever is higher), per Article 99(3).
content.notes: Specific national enforcement and proportionality rules apply; see full Article 99 for details and other tiers.
